Law Offices
of
HERMON L. EMMONS, Jr.
Baltimore, Md. January 1865
To His Excellency,
Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of the State of Kentucky
Sir:
I respectfully request an appointment as Commissioner, resident in Baltimore, Md, and authorized to take Depositions, Acknowledgements of Deeds, &c., for the State of Kentucky

Yours, very respectfully,
Hermon L. Emmons, Jr.
The undersigned, having confidence in the integrity and ability of Hermon L. Emmons, Jr., recommend his appointment as Commissioner of Deeds.

Nelson Taylor
M. C.
William Rogers

Comr Deeds
Maryland
H. L. Emmons Jr.
apptd & comd 29th Mch 1865
